Critical.description: Poses an immediate and severe threat to critical business operations, data integrity, or regulatory compliance. Likely to result in significant financial loss, reputational damage, or legal penalties.

High.description: Poses a significant threat that could disrupt business operations or lead to data exposure. Requires prompt attention to mitigate potential damage.

Medium.description: Represents a moderate threat that could lead to minor disruptions or inefficiencies. Should be addressed as part of regular maintenance cycles.

Low.description: A minor issue that deviates from best practices but has a low probability of being exploited or causing any material impact.

Informational.description: An observation that does not pose a direct risk but is noteworthy for situational awareness or future planning.

data_classification:confidential.notes: Contains sensitive customer PII or financial data.

data_classification:internal.notes: Contains proprietary but non-sensitive business data.

application_tier:critical.notes: Core production application essential for revenue or operations.

compensatingControls.title: Private Subnet Isolation
compensatingControls.description: All production subnets are private and egress is filtered through a firewall, reducing the immediate risk of data exfiltration for unencrypted resources.

compensatingControls.title: Vulnerability Management Program
compensatingControls.description: All production hosts are scanned for vulnerabilities weekly. High and Critical vulnerabilities are patched within 14 days.
